sentences.sentence: Music nursing was the conjunctive product of music, psychology and nursing.
sentences.translation: 音乐护理是音乐、心理学、护理学结合的产物。

sentences.sentence: These types of conjunctive words can be summarized into three types: juxtaposing attaching and condensing.
sentences.translation: 这类连词可分为并列式、附加式、压缩式三种。

sentences.sentence: As the main conjunctive mode of the steel structure, high-strengthened hexangular bolt joint auxiliary has got widely used in production.
sentences.translation: 高强度大六角螺栓连接副作为钢结构的主要连接方式，在生产中得到了广泛的应用。
